# stop()

**Instance Method**

Ends the app life cycle.

## Declaration

```swift
func stop()
```

## Discussion

After the JavaScript context has ended and all resources have been released, [doc://com.apple.tvmlkit/documentation/TVMLKit/TVApplicationControllerDelegate/appController(_:didStop:)] is called. The app controller cannot be reused after the `stop` method has been called.

## Controlling and Handling Events

- **evaluate(inJavaScriptContext:completion:)**: Evaluates a block in the JavaScript execution queue.
